api_list.name: Get all notes for your user with tags
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all notes from login user!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notes-api1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/notes?include=tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notes-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get specific note for your user
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back specific note from login user!
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://notes-api1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/notes/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "notes-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
